name: Pipe Peeler
description:
This is a super casual game for all ages! Tap and hold to peel all corn on pipe and be ware of the obstacles! Merge available circles to unlock more powerful ones. Just tap the button and slice corn from the pipe without hitting any obstacles.
Main Features
- Auto merge to make new circles
- Circles to slice Corn on pipe
- Unique rage booster
- Impressive visual effects
- Easy control
- Fascinating time-killer
Stop waiting around. Just come have FUN! Make you happy all day!
